title: Change Morde's W to selfcast only
body:
Feels terrible to be bound to another teammate or a minion to do any damage. God forbid you find an enemy in the jungle because they will fuck you up. I want old Morde back that can actually fight on his own. Why does Morde heal people anyway? It doesn't even fit his theme.

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
